strapiPost.title: Black Bear Bonanza Returns To Bentonville This Saturday
strapiPost.content:
The Black Bear Bonanza returns to Bentonville this Saturday, Mar 4, from 9a-5p at the Benton County Quail Barn to celebrate Arkansas wildlife, conservation, and all things black bear.

  • Who's there: Enjoy favorites from last year's bonanza, like the World Famous Owl Hoot Contest and a live recording of Clay Newcomb's Bear Grease Podcast, as well as new activities like the Outdoor Brand Pavilion featuring the latest gear and educational seminars about ancient Native American hunting methods and technologies.
  • Bear-y fun: Tickets are just $10, and kids 12 and under get in free! Bring the whole family and enjoy a day filled with fun activities, wildlife exhibits, raffles, and door prizes.

Get your tickets for Black Bear Bonanza 2023 HERE.
